name: Facebook Classic
description: Restores the old FB desktop interface.
additional_info:
Update 16/03/2021
Visual improvements, minor improvements.

Update2 4/03/2021:
Fix for close button not showing in image viewer.

Update 4/03/2021:
restore profile page, was resizing to mobile fit version. bug fixed.

Update (14/02/2021): 
restores the friends list navigation.. you can hide it by selecting 'show friends' option.
Highlight colour for input forms.
